templates.name: Clouds With Active Root Account
templates.description: Identify accounts that have root login access active

templates.name: Clouds With Weak Password Policy
templates.description: Identify accounts with a weak or missing password policy

templates.name: Clouds Without Protected Root Account
templates.description: Identify root login accounts that are not two-factor enabled

templates.name: Clouds Without Global API Accounting
templates.description: Identify accounts without API accounting such as AWS CloudTrail enabled across all regions

templates.name: Security Rules Audit
templates.description: Identify access lists with ports open to the world (SSH as default)

templates.name: Databases Not Multi-AZ
templates.description: Identify databases that are not configured across multiple availablity zones for resiliency

templates.name: Databases With Low Retention Policy
templates.description: Identify database instances with a retention policy that is too low

templates.name: Database Instances Publicly Accessible
templates.description: Identify database instances that are accessible to the public

templates.name: Database Instances Not Encrypted
templates.description: Identify database instances that are not encrypted

templates.name: Database Instances Without Recent Snapshot
templates.description: Identify database instances without a recent manual snapshot

templates.name: Database Instances Username Audit
templates.description: Identify database instances running noncompliant usernames for the master account

templates.name: Instances Scheduler
templates.description: Schedule instance stop/start across one or more clouds/resource groups

templates.name: Region Audit
templates.description: Audit select resource types across specific cloud regions

templates.name: Clouds Without Service Users
templates.description: Identify accounts without any active service users

templates.name: Compute Instance Type Audit
templates.description: Audit compute instance types against select clouds

templates.name: Instances With Ephemeral Root Volume
templates.description: Identify instances with an ephemeral root volume

templates.name: Instances Running Unauthorized Image
templates.description: Identify instances that were created with an unauthorized image

templates.name: Instances Using Unauthorized Root Key Pair
templates.description: Identify instances created without specific SSH key pairs

templates.name: Instances With Ephemeral Public IP
templates.description: Identify instances with an ephemeral public-facing IP address

templates.name: Instances With Failed Status Checks
templates.description: Identify instances that fail the system/reachability status checks

templates.name: Instances With No Name
templates.description: Identify instances that are missing a name

templates.name: Database Instance Type Audit
templates.description: Audit database instance types against select clouds

templates.name: Memcache Instance Type Audit
templates.description: Audit memcache instance types against select clouds

templates.name: SSL Certificates Expired
templates.description: Identify SSL certificates that have expired or will expire soon (14 days by default)

templates.name: Tag Audit
templates.description: Enforce tagging standards and policy across select resource types

templates.name: Storage Containers Exceeding Max Objects
templates.description: Identify storage containers that exceed a total number of objects (10,000 objects by default)

templates.name: Storage Containers Exceeding Max Size
templates.description: Identify storage containers that exceed a total size (1TB by default)

templates.name: Storage Containers Permissions Check
templates.description: Identify storage containers exposing data with permissive access lists

templates.name: Volumes Unattached
templates.description: Identify unattached volumes

templates.name: Public IP Addresses Orphaned
templates.description: Identify unattached IP addresses

templates.name: Cloud Users Without MFA Enabled
templates.description: Identify cloud users without two-factor (MFA) enabled

templates.name: Load Balancers With Access Logging Disabled
templates.description: Identify load balancers that have access logging disabled

templates.name: Load Balancers With Cross Zone Balancing Disabled
templates.description: Identify load balancers that have cross zone balancing disabled

templates.name: Load Balancers With Connection Draining Disabled
templates.description: Identify load balancers that have connection draining disabled

templates.name: Load Balancers With No Instances
templates.description: Identify load balancers with no instance associations

templates.name: Database Engine Types
templates.description: Identify unsupported/blacklisted database engines

templates.name: Storage Containers Without Permissions
templates.description: Identify storage containers without any permission sets

templates.name: Subnet CIDR Exceeds Maximum Netblock
templates.description: Identify subnets where the number of IPs exceeds a defined limit

templates.name: Subnets Running Out Of Space
templates.description: Identify subnets with limited IP block available for use

templates.name: Resource Access Lists Orphaned
templates.description: Identify Resource Access Lists unattached to other cloud resources

templates.name: Storage Containers Permissions Check -- ACL
templates.description: Identify storage containers exposing access list permissions to the world

templates.name: Storage Containers Permissions Check -- Delete
templates.description: Identify storage containers exposing delete permissions to the world

templates.name: Storage Containers Permissions Check -- Read (GET)
templates.description: Identify storage containers exposing read permissions to the world

templates.name: Storage Containers Permissions Check -- Write (PUT)
templates.description: Identify storage containers exposing write permissions to the world

templates.name: Storage Containers Without Object Versioning
templates.description: Identify storage containers without object versioning enabled

templates.name: Storage Containers Without Logging
templates.description: Identify storage containers without logging enabled

templates.name: Big Data Username Audit
templates.description: Identify Big Data instances running noncompliant usernames for the master account

templates.name: Big Data Instance Type Audit
templates.description: Identify Big Data instances running unapproved instance types

templates.name: Big Data Instances Without Encryption Enabled
templates.description: Identify Big Data instances that do not have encryption enabled

templates.name: Big Data Instances Publicly Accessible
templates.description: Identify Big Data instances that are accessible to the public

templates.name: Big Data Instances With Low Retention Policy
templates.description: Identify Big Data instances with a retention policy below a threshold (30 days by default)

templates.name: Port 445 (CIFS) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify TCP/UDP port 445 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP/UDP port 53 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 21 open to the world

templates.description: Identify ICMP open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 1443 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 3306 open to the world

templates.name: Port 137/138 (NetBIOS) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify UDP 137/138 open to the world

templates.name: Ports other than 80/443 (HTTP/HTTPS) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify TCP ports other than 80/443 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 5432 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 3389 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 135 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 445 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 25 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 1433/1434 open to the world

templates.description: Identify TCP port 22 open to the world

templates.name: Port 23 (Telnet) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify TCP port 23 open to the world

templates.name: Port 5500 (VNC Listener) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify TCP port 5500 open to the world

templates.name: Port 5900 (VNC Server) Open to the World
templates.description: Identify TCP port 5900 open to the world

templates.name: Snapshots Older Than 30 Days
templates.description: Identify snapshots that are older than 30 days

templates.name: Snapshots Older Than 60 Days
templates.description: Identify snapshots that are older than 60 days

templates.name: Snapshots Older Than 90 Days
templates.description: Identify snapshots that are older than 90 days

templates.name: Volumes With Auto-Termination
templates.description: Identify volumes set to automatically delete when the parent instance is terminated

templates.name: Volumes Without Encryption Enabled
templates.description: Identify volumes without encryption enabled

templates.name: Volumes With Excessive IOPS
templates.description: Identify volumes with an excessively high number of IOPS

templates.name: Volume Type Audit
templates.description: Identify volumes running unapproved types

templates.name: Volumes Without A Recent Snapshot
templates.description: Identify volumes without a snapshot in the past fourteen days DEBUG

templates.name: Cloud Users With Unauthorized Policies
templates.description: Identify cloud users running unauthorized policies

templates.name: Cloud Users With Inactive Accounts
templates.description: Identify inactive cloud service users who have not logged into the cloud provider console recently (45 days by default)

templates.name: Cloud Users With Older API Keys
templates.description: Identify cloud users with older API key credentials that should be rotated (90 days by default)

templates.name: Networks Without Internet Access
templates.description: Identify networks without an attached Internet gateway

templates.name: Regions Without Default Network
templates.description: Identify regions without a default network

templates.name: Regions With Impaired Availability Zone
templates.description: Identify regions with one or more zones in an impaired state

templates.name: Hypervisors With No Instances
templates.description: Identify hypervisors that contain zero instances

templates.name: Hypervisors Not In Service
templates.description: Identify hypervisors that are not in a functional state

templates.name: Hypervisors Nearing Saturation
templates.description: Identify hypervisors with high instance usage (90 percent by default)

templates.name: SSL Certificates With Heartbleed Vulnerability
templates.description: Identify SSL certificates that may be vulnerable to SSL Heartbleed

templates.name: Resource Age Check
templates.description: Identify resources based on their age (default is 24 hours).

templates.name: Region Limits -- Volumes
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the volume threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Storage Containers
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the storage container threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Snapshots
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the snapshot threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Security Groups
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the security group threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Public IPs
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the public IP threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Private Networks
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the private network threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Internet Gateways
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the Internet gateway threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Compute Instances
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the compute instance threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Database Instances
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the database instance threshold

templates.name: Region Limits -- Cache Instances
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the cache instance threshold

templates.name: Curate resources by owner
templates.description: Curate resources info a resource group based on an owner tag

templates.name: Region Limits
templates.description: Identify regions within 80% or more of the threshold for any resource type

templates.name: Database Instances With Zero Connections
templates.description: Identify database instances with zero connections over a period of time (14 days default)

templates.name: Database Security Groups Exposing Public Access
templates.description: Identify database security groups that expose public access (n.b., AWS only)

templates.name: Instances Running 24x7
templates.description: Identify compute instances that have been running 24x7 over a period of time (default is 1 day)

templates.name: Instances Averaging High CPU
templates.description: Identify compute instances that have been averaging a high CPU over a period of time (n.b., AWS only)

templates.name: Instances Averaging Low CPU
templates.description: Identify compute instances that have been averaging a low CPU over a period of time (n.b., AWS only)

templates.name: Instances Exposing Public SSH
templates.description: Identify compute instances with an attached security group that exposes SSH access to the world (0.0.0.0/0)

templates.name: Instances Without Tags
templates.description: Identify compute instances without any tag key/value pairs

templates.name: Networks With Impaired Flow Logs
templates.description: Identify network resources having their flow log delivery impaired (n.b., AWS only).

templates.name: Reserved Instances Expiring Soon
templates.description: Identify reserved instances set to expire within a set number of days (default is 30 days)

templates.name: Volumes In Error State
templates.description: Identify unhealthy volumes that are not functional

templates.name: Instance Cores Exceed
templates.description: Identify instances exceeding a defined number of CPU cores (default is 4 cores)

templates.name: Instance Memory Exceeds
templates.description: Identify instances exceeding a user-defined amount of GB in RAM (default is 32 GB)

templates.name: Instance Lifecycle State
templates.description: Identify instances in a particular lifecycle state, e.g., Running

templates.name: Instance Lifecycle State Exceeds Threshold
templates.description: Identify instances that have been in a particular lifecycle state, e.g., Running, over a user-defined period of time

templates.name: Resource Cost Exceeds
templates.description: Identify resources whose monthly cost exceeds a user-defined value (default $100)

templates.name: Resource Has No Owner
templates.description: Identify resources that do not have an owner

templates.name: Instance Security Group Associations
templates.description: Identify instances associated with user-provided Security Groups (n.b., AWS only)

templates.name: Volume State Time Threshold
templates.description: Identify volumes that have been in a user-selected state for a user-defined period of time (defaults are 'available' and 1 day)

templates.name: Networks With Internet Gateway
templates.description: Identify networks with an attached Internet gateway

templates.name: Network With Instances
templates.description: Identify networks with at least one instance

templates.name: Network With No Instances
templates.description: Identify networks with zero instances

templates.name: Network Peering Connections
templates.description: Identify network peering connections by cloud account numbers

templates.name: Network Resources With Traffic Logging Configured
templates.description: Identify network resources that have traffic logging, e.g., AWS VPC Flow Log, enabled

templates.name: Network Resources Without Traffic Logging Configured
templates.description: Identify network resources that do not have traffic logging, e.g., AWS VPC Flow Log, enabled

templates.name: Snapshot of Type
templates.description: Identify database or memcache snapshots based upon their type, e.g., manual or automated

templates.name: Load Balancer Scheme
templates.description: Identify whether a load balancer is internet-facing or internal

templates.name: Load Balancers With SSL Listener
templates.description: Identify load balancers with an SSL listener

templates.name: Load Balancers Without SSL Listener
templates.description: Identify load balancers without an SSL listener

templates.name: Service Encryption Key Rotation Disabled
templates.description: Identify encryption keys that have key rotation disabled

templates.name: Service Encryption Key Expired or Expiring Soon
templates.description: Identify encryption keys that are expired or are expiring within user-defined number of days (default is 14 days)

templates.name: Service Encryption Key Disabled
templates.description: Identify encryption keys that are disabled

templates.name: Snapshots Publicly Available
templates.description: Identify snapshots that are accessible to the public

templates.name: Storage Container With Encryption
templates.description: Identify storage containers, e.g., AWS S3 buckets, with encryption enabled

templates.name: Storage Container Without Encryption
templates.description: Identify storage containers, e.g., AWS S3 buckets, without encryption enabled
